summary: Clean implementation that adds a description_md field to Page and PageVersion models with automatic HTML-to-Markdown conversion on save. The code follows existing patterns in the codebase and uses the already-included beautifulsoup4 dependency.

issues.description: Unused loop variable 'i' in enumerate call
issues.suggestion: Use 'for _, sibling in enumerate(siblings)' or just 'for sibling in siblings' since the index isn't used

issues.description: Consider using 'lxml' parser instead of 'html.parser' for better performance and handling of malformed HTML
issues.suggestion: Change to BeautifulSoup(html, 'lxml') if lxml is available, but 'html.parser' works fine for most cases

positives: Follows existing pattern in codebase - mirrors the description_stripped implementation exactly
BeautifulSoup is already a project dependency (beautifulsoup4==4.12.3), no new dependencies needed
Comprehensive HTML-to-Markdown conversion supporting headings, lists, tables, code blocks, links, images, and custom components
Read-only serializer field prevents client from directly setting description_md
Migration properly depends on previous migration (0116)
Clean separation with new field being automatically derived from description_html on save
Handles edge cases like empty strings and None values correctly
